TopicTitle: [1.2.0] Toolbar 1.7.13 - Common API for draggable/resizable buttons toolbar

Articles.Content: I figured I would ask here, as I have asked in the other relevant mod threads and came up dry. I am having an issue where I do not see the toolbar icon at all in the SPH or VAB. I have mods that utilize this toolbar and they are showing up properly in the KSC and flight scenes (extraplanetary launchpads and infernal robotics). But the toolbar icon does not show up at all in the SPH and VAB. It is only annoying as EPL has a build window that pops up when building a ship in the VAB and the toolbar is the only way to turn it off.

I figured I would ask here, as I have asked in the other relevant mod threads and came up dry. I am having an issue where I do not see the toolbar icon at all in the SPH or VAB. I have mods that utilize this toolbar and they are showing up properly in the KSC and flight scenes (extraplanetary launchpads and infernal robotics). But the toolbar icon does not show up at all in the SPH and VAB. It is only annoying as EPL has a build window that pops up when building a ship in the VAB and the toolbar is the only way to turn it off.

Try deleting the file:

KSP_win\GameData\toolbar-settings.dat

Just an FYI, I found the answer by searching this thread for "vab"

Edit: I just updated the path above, it was incorrect

Edited May 19, 2015 by linuxgurugamer
Corrected path

G'day blizzy and sarbian, I have a question that one or both of you might be able to help me with. It could be a a problem with 1.0.2 itself, but after playing for a while the Mechjeb buttons on the Toolbar stop functioning. I can call up the functions from the MJ side menu, but those on the toolbar click with no result. Restart KSP and the Toolbar functions again.

Because most mods that I use are not compatible with 1.0.2 I am sticking with 1.0.0 for now. but I have a huge problem toolbar is not compatible with 1.0.0 , can you tell me what version is compatible with 1.0.0 cause I tried 1.7.8 and 1.7.9 none work is there a mod toolbar that works with 1.0.0 other than this one or I am doing something wrong.
I would really like to see an option to "Dock" this into the stock toolbar. Basically, have a button you click that will pull out the toolbar, then click it again to hide it.
Why toggle the toolbar with buttons if it can be pulled out and hidden by mousing over it?

G'day blizzy and sarbian, I have a question that one or both of you might be able to help me with. It could be a a problem with 1.0.2 itself, but after playing for a while the Mechjeb buttons on the Toolbar stop functioning.

Same here. I'm under the impression that this reliably happens everytime I dock two vessels. Going to KSC and back to the vessel fixes the issue (KSP 1.0.2 -- haven't tried in the more recent versions yet).
The Toolbar Plugin does not care about what vessels are doing, so I'd say the problem should be on the MechJeb side.
What he said. Post in my thread with steps to duplicate.
BTW, Why is this mod not added to CKAN?????? I would have never found it if I did not see it in the RPM page mods that use this section.

at load I get a msg says for some reason aaa_toolbar not compatible with 104

at load I get a msg says for some reason aaa_toolbar not compatible with 104

Just a warning.

Just a warning.

Any way to disable it?

Any way to disable it?

You can manually change the line "1.0.2" in ..\Kerbal Space Program\GameData\000_Toolbar\version.txt to "1.0.4" to hide the warning. I'm not sure that this will affect notifications of new updates for the toolbar though.

Can anyone help me w/ a problem I'm having? I think I installed the mod correctly, but the Crew Manifest Icon isn't showing up. Any idea how to fix this?

You have to enable which icons to display in each scene. Right click the down arrow and add the mod you want shown in that screen.
